task_text: I'm joining Bellini soon. Where can I read about how time tracking works, and what are the main reasons we track time?

text_blocks: I can see you're accessing from the public website (is_public=true). This means you're not yet logged in as an employee.

input.message:
Welcome to Bellini! I'm glad to hear you'll be joining us soon. However, information about our time tracking procedures and internal policies is part of our internal documentation and is only available to employees who are logged into our company systems.

Once you've officially joined and received your employee credentials, you'll be able to access our internal wiki which contains detailed documentation about time tracking processes, policies, and the reasons behind them.

In the meantime, if you have questions about onboarding or need preliminary information, I'd suggest reaching out to your HR contact or hiring manager who can help guide you through what to expect.
